trends: There have been 95 other sightings in Atlanta
There were no other sightings in Atlanta on or around August 8th 2013
Summary: Darkish Oblong object hovered motionless for 45 seconds plus ... then vanishised
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sunbathing in Atlanta, Ga and was about to go inside around 5:30 P.M. I glanced up, and clear as day ... there was a dark object hovering in the sky ... I looked away repeatedly to verify what I was seeing ... I even tried to film it to no avail ... It just sat there for over 45 seconds ... Motionless.
